description: Works to the following trees:Trees In G3 & G3A:Grey Poplar - Recent stem failure on railside & established internal decay present (Remove to ground level & treat stump with Eco-Plugs)Grey Poplar - Recent stem failure on railside & established internal decay present (Remove to ground level & treat stump with Eco-Plugs)Grey Poplar - Ganoderma fungal bracket at base of tree indicating established internal decay (Remove to ground level & treat stump with Eco-Plugs)Grey Poplar - Ganoderma fungal bracket at base of tree indicating established internal decay, stem failure hung up in adjacent tree.(Remove to ground level & treat stump with Eco-Plugs)All remaining trees in the group G3 & G3A to be pollarded to previous pollard pointsTree In G10:Grey Poplar - Decay present in lower stem sapwood (Remove to ground level & treat stump with Eco-Plugs)Remaining tree in the group G10 to be pollarded to previous pollard points9 x Trees In G11:Mix of Grey & Lombardy Poplars - Within striking distance of the Railway Infrastructure including HV Overhead Line Equipment - Established decay present (Remove to ground level & treat stumps with Eco-Plugs)And the planting of 14 replacement trees to replace those removed(This application affects Grade II Listed Buildings)
